pr_title: Add dummy objects for new deployments to list in instance response.

timeline.message: Add dummy objects for new deployments to list in instance response

timeline.bodyText:
Both console and dashboard expect that this object also contains tenant, application and instance.
Dashboard additionally expects that url is set.
timeline.author: freva

replies.bodyText: Certainly won't set URL, as that would just point to a 404. So I can set the application ID, but this is surely pointless, as all three values are set on the grandparent object (the instance object container the array of deployments). I also intended for the missing url to serve as the indication that this is a dummy object.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Also, It seems to be the application id (tenant, application, instance) isn't set, unless it is a "recursive request"?
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Ah, yes, you're right. Let me fix the clients to make sure they can handle this change first (so they don't make the request that'll lead to 404).
replies.author: freva
